entry.title: Thursday: Chance of flurries. High minus 21. POP 40%
entry.summary: A mix of sun and cloud. 40 percent chance of flurries this morning. Wind southwest 20 km/h becoming light this afternoon. High minus 21. Wind chill minus 41 this morning and minus 28 this afternoon. Frostbite in minutes. Forecast issued 04:50 AM EST Thursday 26 January 2023

entry.title: Thursday night: A few clouds. Low minus 35.
